pr_title: [BEAM-10201] Reduce scope of ParseResult AutoValue properties.

timeline.message: Reduce scope of ParseResult AutoValue properties. Access should only be via getResult and getFailedToParseLines
Fix scope issues with JsonToRowWithErrFn to enable exposure of the extended error info.

timeline.bodyText:
Aren't these two the methods that users will be trying to access?
(others LGTM)
timeline.author: pabloem

replies.bodyText:
There are two public methods:
https://github.com/apache/beam/pull/12175/files#diff-eef3983ed081455798dfacfa9251ff38L382
https://github.com/apache/beam/pull/12175/files#diff-eef3983ed081455798dfacfa9251ff38L393
That folks can use
replies.author: rezarokni
